body:
Jeffrey McGrew wrote:


>>Is this accessible online someplace? 
> 
> Uhm... no. Guess not. I thought I had posted it to this
> Revit support site where I was talking about Radiance,
> but I guess I didn't. Is there a good spot for me to
> post it? I don't currently have one.


Well, probably the best place for it is radiance-online.org.  If there's 
no place for it there, I'd be happy to post it on my website. My search 
engine is nonexistent at the moment, but after a few days Google would 
index the page and maybe some wayward sould looking for help with 
installing radiance would stumble upon your howto on my website.  Let me 
know.


> No problem. It was just my first big hurtle in learning radiance
> and/or the *nix command line, so I thought I'd talk about it to
> help others in my position.


Right on.






      Rob Guglielmetti


e. rpg@rumblestrip.org
w. www.rumblestrip.org
___
